name: Planetary Shield
Lore: 'Key installations are protected from bombardment by a complex network of early-warning sensors, emergency shields and fast-response fighters.',
Text: 'If Center of Tyranny on table, deploy on Coruscant. Once during your control phase, if you occupy Main Power Plant, may draw destiny. If destiny >5, Planetary Shield ''disabled'' (place this device out of play; opponent loses 3 Force). May not be lost.',
